metadata.scenario: Customer service interaction about a delayed package

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling about a package that was supposed to be delivered yesterday. The tracking information hasn't updated, and I'm starting to get worried.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I understand your concern. Could you please provide your tracking number so I can look into this for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's 9876543210. And honestly, this is the third time this has happened with your company this year. What's going on with your delivery service? It's seriously impacting my business!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I apologize for the inconvenience this has caused you. I've checked the tracking information for your package. It appears there's a slight delay due to a backlog at the sorting facility in your area. It's currently scheduled for delivery tomorrow. Regarding the previous issues, I can access your account history and investigate the root causes of the past delays if you would like me to.
